author: lightclient
content: When shard committees change, do they retrieve the historic transactions for the new shard?

author: djrtwo
content:
A shard ("persistent") committee gets some amount of lookahead (~1 day) on the shard they will be assigned to. At that point, they should start syncing shard blocks (and perform state transitions) from the recent finalized crosslink in their beacon state. This would provide a sufficient overlap with the outgoing committee in having recent block/transaction data to serve to others in the network. 

The numbers on lookahead, length of time on a shard, etc are still in flux
